items.name: AquaFun Lagoon
items.short_description: A vibrant water park featuring multiple slides, splash pads, and a lazy river designed specifically for children of all ages.
items.address: Plot 10, Port Harcourt Road, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Splashland Owerri
items.short_description: Offering a variety of shallow pools, interactive water fountains, and gentle slides, perfect for toddlers and young children to safely enjoy.
items.address: Off Egbu Road, Behind Shoprite, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Tropical Riptide Park
items.short_description: An adventurous water park with themed zones, including a pirate ship play area and an exciting wave pool suitable for older kids.
items.address: World Bank Road Extension, New Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Sunny Bay Waterworld
items.short_description: A family-friendly water attraction featuring shaded relaxation areas, a gentle current river, and small slides for a relaxed day out.
items.address: Plot 5, Okigwe Road, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Owerri Toon Town
items.short_description: A magical place where kids can meet their favorite cartoon characters, get autographs, and take memorable photos.
items.address: Ikenegbu Layout Extension, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Characterland Cafe
items.short_description: Enjoy a delicious meal while beloved cartoon mascots visit your table for a unique and interactive dining experience.
items.address: Wetheral Road, Beside Shoprite, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Hero's Hall Meet & Greet
items.short_description: A special event venue hosting rotating appearances from popular superhero and fantasy characters, with storytelling sessions.
items.address: Aladinma Avenue, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Fantasy Forest Character Zone
items.short_description: Explore a whimsical forest setting where friendly animated characters emerge for spontaneous interactions and photo opportunities.
items.address: Off IMSU Back Gate Road, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Brick Builders Zone Owerri
items.short_description: An expansive indoor park filled with millions of LEGO bricks, allowing children to build, create, and display their masterpieces.
items.address: Warehouse Roundabout, Along Okigwe Road, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: MegaBlock Mania Workshop
items.short_description: Focuses on larger construction blocks for younger children, fostering motor skills and imaginative play in a safe environment.
items.address: Shoprite Mall, Ground Floor, Egbu Road, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Engineer's Lab: Lego Robotics
items.short_description: An interactive lab where older children can learn basic engineering principles and robotics through guided LEGO mindstorms projects.
items.address: FUTO-Nekede Road, Ihiagwa, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Owerri Brick City Model
items.short_description: Features intricate LEGO models of Owerri landmarks and a free-build area where kids can contribute to a growing miniature city.
items.address: Orlu Road, Opposite Imo State University, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Green Acres Kids Farm
items.short_description: A charming farm where children can interact with friendly animals, learn about agriculture, and enjoy pony rides.
items.address: Off Onitsha Road, Near Avu Community, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Owerri Petting Zoo & Orchard
items.short_description: A delightful petting zoo featuring goats, sheep, and chickens, alongside an orchard where kids can pick seasonal fruits.
items.address: Mbari Street, Extension, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: The Little Farmer's Corner
items.short_description: An educational attraction where children participate in simulated farm tasks, from planting seeds to collecting eggs, promoting hands-on learning.
items.address: Area H, World Bank Housing Estate, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: OW-Farm Fun Park
items.short_description: A compact farm-themed park with miniature tractors, a corn maze (seasonal), and a barnyard play area for endless fun.
items.address: MCC Road, Opposite Federal Secretariat, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Owerri Ocean Wonders
items.short_description: A captivating aquarium showcasing marine life from Nigeria's coastlines and beyond, with interactive touch tanks for kids.
items.address: Government House Road, New Owerri, Imo State

items.name: AquaRealm Discovery Centre
items.short_description: Explore a vibrant collection of freshwater fish and amphibians, complete with engaging educational displays and feeding demonstrations.
items.address: Plot 8, Akwakuma Road, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Coral Reef Kids Aquarium
items.short_description: A smaller, kid-focused aquarium with colorful coral exhibits, clownfish, and interactive games about ocean conservation.
items.address: Nekede Road, Ihiagwa, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: The Deep Blue Classroom
items.short_description: Combines an aquarium experience with marine biology workshops, offering an in-depth look at aquatic ecosystems for curious young minds.
items.address: Works Layout, Near Concorde Hotel, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Joyland Rides Owerri
items.short_description: A classic amusement park offering a range of gentle and thrilling rides suitable for various age groups, including a carousel and mini-coaster.
items.address: Port Harcourt Road, Opposite Imo State Zoo, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Thrillville Junior Fun Park
items.short_description: Designed for younger thrill-seekers, this park features scaled-down versions of popular rides, ensuring a safe and exciting experience.
items.address: Orlu Road, Umuodu, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Adventure Spin & Fly
items.short_description: An indoor amusement center with bumper cars, a small Ferris wheel, and interactive arcade games, perfect for rainy days.
items.address: Relief Market Road, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Carnival Corner Owerri
items.short_description: Experience the joy of a carnival with classic rides like a swing carousel, teacup ride, and various games of skill for prizes.
items.address: Plot 2, Federal Secretariat Road, New Owerri, Imo State

items.name: StarGazers Academy Owerri
items.short_description: An immersive planetarium offering captivating shows about stars, planets, and constellations, tailored for young astronomers.
items.address: Along Owerri-Aba Road, Near FUTO Main Gate, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Cosmic Kids Hub
items.short_description: A hands-on science center with a small dome planetarium, allowing children to explore basic concepts of space and gravity through interactive exhibits.
items.address: Old Nekede Road, Ihiagwa, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Galaxy Explorers Dome
items.short_description: Features animated planetarium shows that take children on a virtual journey through the solar system, with engaging stories and facts.
items.address: Area A, World Bank Housing Estate, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Little Astronauts Observatory
items.short_description: Offers introductory stargazing sessions with kid-friendly telescopes and storytelling about mythological constellations, weather permitting.
items.address: Off Egbu Road, Behind Federal Medical Centre, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Jungle Quest Zone Owerri
items.short_description: An immersive indoor adventure playground with multi-level climbing structures, slides, and obstacle courses set in a jungle theme.
items.address: Ikenegbu Layout, Douglas Road, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Mystery Island Escape Room (Kids Edition)
items.short_description: A specially designed escape room adventure for children, where they solve puzzles and riddles to unlock secrets and 'escape' an island.
items.address: Works Layout, Near Alvan Ikoku College of Education, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Treasure Hunt Trails Owerri
items.short_description: Outdoor guided treasure hunts across scenic parts of Owerri parks, where kids follow clues and solve challenges to find hidden treasures.
items.address: Imo State Zoological Garden & Wildlife Park, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Medieval Quest Playground
items.short_description: A themed outdoor playground designed as a castle, complete with towers, drawbridges, and role-playing props for imaginative knightly quests.
items.address: Royce Road, New Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Curiosity Corner Owerri
items.short_description: An interactive children's museum fostering learning through play with exhibits on science, art, and Nigerian culture.
items.address: Wetheral Road, Opposite Assumpta Cathedral, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Discovery Kids Lab & Museum
items.short_description: Focuses on hands-on science experiments, a robotics corner, and an innovation workshop to spark young inventors' minds.
items.address: Egbu Road, Near Imo State University Teaching Hospital, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Little Artisans Studio & Gallery
items.short_description: A creative space within a museum, offering art classes, craft workshops, and a gallery showcasing children's artworks.
items.address: Ikenegbu Layout, Off Oparanozie Street, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: History & Heritage Junior Museum
items.short_description: Introduces children to the rich history and cultural heritage of Imo State and Nigeria through engaging stories, artifacts, and dress-up activities.
items.address: Plot 1, Concorde Boulevard, New Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Adventure Oasis Park
items.short_description: A vast outdoor park featuring elaborate climbing frames, swings, zip lines, and picnic areas for a full day of family fun.
items.address: Along Aba Road, Ihiagwa, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Funland Owerri Kids Park
items.short_description: A popular community playground with modern play equipment, including slides, sandpits, and dedicated areas for different age groups.
items.address: Rochas Okorocha Street, New Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Nature's Edge Play Garden
items.short_description: A natural playground emphasizing wooden structures, sensory gardens, and opportunities for imaginative play within a lush, green setting.
items.address: Along Owerri-Port Harcourt Road, Umuguma, Owerri, Imo State

items.name: Urban Kids Adventure Hub
items.short_description: An indoor adventure park featuring trampolines, soft play areas, and a climbing wall, perfect for active kids regardless of weather.
items.address: Okwu Uratta Road, Opp. Eastern Palm University, Owerri, Imo State
